ABOUT_US_VERSION_EXISTS: About Us page with this version already exists
ABOUT_US_VERSION_LENGTH: Version must be between 1 and 20 characters
ABOUT_US_TITLE_LENGTH: Title must be between 5 and 100 characters
ABOUT_US_SECTION_TITLE_LENGTH: Section title must be between 5 and 100 characters
ABOUT_US_SECTION_CONTENT_LENGTH: Section content must be at least 10 characters
ABOUT_US_SECTIONS_REQUIRED: At least one section is required
CANNOT_DELETE_ACTIVE_ABOUT_US: Cannot delete active About Us page
